name: beginnersbase11ty
description: A spring board for the next project that aims to be good for a beginner who enjoys enough simplicty to understand how the parts all fit together and build on solid understanding (hopefully!)

scripts.build: ELEVENTY_PRODUCTION=true eleventy && NODE_ENV=production npx tailwind build -i ./src/css/tailwind.css -o ./dist/css/style.css
scripts.start: ELEVENTY_PRODUCTION=true eleventy --pathprefix="/beginnersBase11ty/" && NODE_ENV=production npx tailwind build ./src/css/tailwind.css -o ./dist/css/style.css
